oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When it seems as if the rain will break, the people start seeking springbok. An account of the driving and shooting of springbok, and hunting methods in general. 1) This story follows on from Rainbow (|kaggen and |kwammana), 2) p.6603v: see About poison, 3) p.6608v: an expression used for strong wind, 4) p.6610v: an expression used for handsome people, 5) p.6611v: on shooting and holding the bow and the arrow, 6) p.6616v: |xam names for Bastards ('Bastaards') and Korannas, 7) This story is found in Book VIII-7.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Springbok hunting
